data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 44,233 believers in Lakhimpur Kheri and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lakhimpur Kheri, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Lakhimpur Kheri are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 44,233 believers in Lakhimpur Kheri to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 44,233 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kalabaz people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kalabaz people.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Lakhimpur Kheri that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Lakhimpur Kheri, Uttar Pradesh, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Lakhimpur Kheri, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Lakhimpur Kheri
location.people_groups_list: Dhobi Batham, Vaddar (Sikh traditions), Tawaif (Muslim traditions), Arakh, Bharbhunja (Hindu traditions)
